Class Ground

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable, Skilled, GroundInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dirt, Floor, Grass, Shop, Tree, Wall

    public abstract class Ground
extends java.lang.Object
implements GroundInterface, Skilled, Printable
    Class representing terrain type
